name: Arctico
description:
A peaceful exploration and base building game about recovering your late mentor’s work.Base building
Collect valuable resources, set up experiments, sell plant seeds, and expand your science outpost!Take care of your plants and experiments
Producing lots of crops and data will allow you to upgrade your base and buy new equipment!Decorate your base
Once you find new decorative objects you will be able to place them anywhere!Exploring
Discover the many locations around the island .The past
Find the letters left behind by previous pioneersDog sleigh
Your loyal dogs will provide you the most reliable expedition vehicle there is.Co-op
You can do all of this with a friend!
